title: Android 11 in Pixel 4a with my app installed crashes app if mobile data turned off during use
content:
I am developing an app.  It is designed to work online and offline.  If I am offline and open the app all is well.  Same for if I am online and open the app.  However, if I already have the app open and turn off network data the app crashes.  If, without closing the app, I then turn data back on again the app immediately recovers.  I have looked at all options and it works fine in my development environment, just not on the actual phone.

I am wondering if my code is wrong or if it is an issue with the phone or android that I will not be able to overcome.

Please advise

Thanks
